launchSystems.name: Bomb Rack
launchSystems.description: Simple bomb rack that drops unguided bombs. Capacity cannot be expanded.

launchSystems.name: Bomb Bay
launchSystems.description: Internal bomb storage bay. Can be reloaded in space. Capacity can be expanded.

launchSystems.name: Missile Rack
launchSystems.description: External missile rack. Can fire multiple missiles per round. Capacity cannot be expanded.

launchSystems.name: Missile Tube
launchSystems.description: Internal missile storage and launch tube. Can be reloaded in space. Lower rate of fire but higher capacity.

launchSystems.name: Minelayer
launchSystems.description: Mine deployment system. Deploys mine patterns (10 mines minimum for effectiveness).

launchSystems.name: Ordnance Cell Array
launchSystems.description: Vertical launch cells similar to modern naval vessels. Flexible ordnance loading.

propulsionSystems.name: Bomb Casing (Light)
propulsionSystems.description: Light bomb casing. No propulsion - relies on delivery ship.

propulsionSystems.name: Bomb Casing (Medium)
propulsionSystems.description: Medium bomb casing. No propulsion - relies on delivery ship.

propulsionSystems.name: Bomb Casing (Heavy)
propulsionSystems.description: Heavy bomb casing. No propulsion - relies on delivery ship.

propulsionSystems.name: Mine Casing (Light)
propulsionSystems.description: Light mine casing. Stationary once deployed.

propulsionSystems.name: Mine Casing (Medium)
propulsionSystems.description: Medium mine casing. Stationary once deployed.

propulsionSystems.name: Mine Casing (Heavy)
propulsionSystems.description: Heavy mine casing. Stationary once deployed.

propulsionSystems.name: Chemical Rocket
propulsionSystems.description: Simple chemical rocket. Only effective against slow targets.

propulsionSystems.name: Light Missile (Ion)
propulsionSystems.description: Light ion-powered missile. PL6 propulsion system.

propulsionSystems.name: Heavy Missile (Ion)
propulsionSystems.description: Heavy ion-powered missile. PL6 propulsion system.

propulsionSystems.name: Light Missile (Gravitic)
propulsionSystems.description: Light gravitic missile. Particle impulse or gravity induction drive.

propulsionSystems.name: Medium Missile (Gravitic)
propulsionSystems.description: Medium gravitic missile. Particle impulse or gravity induction drive.

propulsionSystems.name: Heavy Missile (Gravitic)
propulsionSystems.description: Heavy gravitic missile. Particle impulse or gravity induction drive.

propulsionSystems.name: Light Missile (Inertial)
propulsionSystems.description: Light inertial flux missile. Advanced PL8 propulsion.

propulsionSystems.name: Medium Missile (Inertial)
propulsionSystems.description: Medium inertial flux missile. Advanced PL8 propulsion.

propulsionSystems.name: Tachyon Missile
propulsionSystems.description: Tachyon FTL missile. Hits target instantly. Ignores high-velocity penalties.

warheads.name: AA Burst
warheads.description: Anti-aircraft burst warhead. Effective against small craft and missiles.

warheads.name: CHE (Conventional High Explosive)
warheads.description: Conventional high-explosive warhead. Good against small craft.

warheads.name: KE Submunition
warheads.description: Kinetic energy submunitions. Spreads tungsten darts on impact.

warheads.name: Low-Yield Nuke
warheads.description: Small nuclear warhead (2-3 kilotons). Area effect weapon.

warheads.name: High-Yield Nuke
warheads.description: Large nuclear warhead (1 megaton). City-killer strategic weapon.

warheads.name: MRB (Mass Reaction Burst)
warheads.description: Dark matter reaction warhead. Concentrated energy wave.

warheads.name: Matter (Antimatter)
warheads.description: Antimatter warhead. Equivalent to nuclear weapon.

warheads.name: Starload
warheads.description: Miniaturized dark matter reaction warhead. Powerful tactical weapon.

warheads.name: Nova Burst
warheads.description: Gravitational compression warhead. Can cripple destroyers or cruisers.

warheads.name: Zero Point
warheads.description: Quantum fluctuation warhead. Devastates thousands of square kilometers.

warheads.name: Null Bomb
warheads.description: Disintegration field warhead. Reduces all matter to subatomic dust.

guidanceSystems.name: Active Radar
guidanceSystems.description: Active radar seeker. Fire-and-forget. Can be jammed by ECM.

guidanceSystems.name: EM Homing
guidanceSystems.description: EM emissions seeker. +2 step penalty if target not EM active.

guidanceSystems.name: IR Homing
guidanceSystems.description: Infrared heat seeker. +2 step penalty if target is cold.

guidanceSystems.name: Command Guidance
guidanceSystems.description: Remote control guidance. Not fire-and-forget. Can be jammed.

guidanceSystems.name: Mass Homing
guidanceSystems.description: Gravitational signature seeker. Very hard to fool.

guidanceSystems.name: AI Probability
guidanceSystems.description: AI-assisted guidance with predictive tracking. Extremely accurate.
